name: BreakQuest [PSPM]
description:
Enjoy 100 unique levels. All of them have their own colorful designs, elements behavior and sparkling visual effects. Bricks, ball, weapons and everything else have something to show. New physics and collision system offer a completely new game experience for your pleasure.
Discover never seen before power ups and power downs, including 9 different weapons and much more. Breakout set the basis, Arkanoid improved the concept. BreakQuest takes a step beyond.
Flow with the music of the professional gaming music group ‘Maniacs of Noise’ and enjoy lots of original, powerful, fun, high quality sound effects.
Command the ship of your choice from 10 different models. Control its fully deformable bouncing surface to save the world, or just to have some fun. Master the ball and clear the latest bricks with the Gravitor.
Story mode with three difficulty settings each one, with fine tuned levels configuration, including number and disposition of bricks, bugs behavior and physics.
